Sent: Monday, November 25, 2002 8:53 AM
Subject: [zzzzteana] An announcement


> Mr Tim Chapman, freelance gentleman of letters of Halifax, Yorkshire,
> announces his betrothal to Dr Ro Gault, virtual reality boffin of Cardiff
> University, Wales. Nuptials to be arranged at later date. No flowers.
>
> TimC
> Bloody hell, she said yes!
________________________

Congratulations Ro & Tim - Here's to your lifelong happiness.

Here's some advice written by Odgen Nash:

"To keep love brimming in the loving cup, When you're wrong admit it and
when you're right shut up!"

Best wishes

Ju
